project_abstract.cdata: The Afghanistan Sustainable Development of Natural Resources Project aims to assist the Ministry of Mines in improving its capacity to effectively regulate Afghanistan's minerals and hydrocarbon resources sector in a transparent manner and foster private sector development. Among the benefits to Afghanistan of development of its mineral resources will be tax revenues, employment, rural development, and economic spin-offs. This project will support the Ministry of Mines to make the transition from being a producer of minerals and other commodities to a policy-making institution and regulator for the sector through capacity building and institutional strengthening across four components: (1) improving internal efficiencies of ministry departments, (2) developing regulatory capacity, (3) developing mineral resources, and (4) enhancing sector governance. Among the benefits to Afghanistan o f development of its mineral resources will be tax revenues, employment, rural development, and economic spin-offs.
